name: The Man In The Lake
description: This game is based off the creepy pasta The Man In The Lake It Goes Like This a Kid Named Jack nelson Was stung by a swarm of bees and know his face is covered in bumps and people made fun of him at school one day he went home crying his mom asked him why and he told her the mom was mad she ended up locking him in a closet and burning the house down but 30 years later he was alive the skin on his face was gone so know  he just wears a mask  and hides in the school lake but before he did that he killed the bullies then his mom and know he just hides in lake
